summary: Adds a simple standalone follower in the Nightgate Inn.
descriptionHtml:
[b][i][color=#cfe2f3][size=4][center]Uni Followers - Nina[/center][/size][/color][/i][/b]
[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/58950-2-1413039525.jpg[/img]

[b][size=4]Description:[/size][/b]

Nina is a custom standalone Breton follower that resides in the Nightgate inn.
She uses a One-handed weapon with a Shield and Heavy Armor. Her equipment consists of some simple Iron Armor with an Iron Sword and Iron Shield. You'll have to get better equipment for your followers yourself!
The CBBE body option is a custom body I made with Bodyslide.
No custom voice or anything, as I don't have the resources to do this.


[b][size=4]Installation:[/size][/b]

[b][size=2]Manual:[/size][/b] Extract the content of the folder inside the archive to your Skyrim Data directory.
[b][size=2]NMM:[/size][/b] Install. It's fairly straightforward.


[b][size=4]Requirements:[/size][/b]

Nothing. At all.


[b][size=4]Credits for assets used, and many thanks to:[/size]
[/b]
KS Hairdos: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58221/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58221/?[/url]

Bodyslide 2.0: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?
[/url]UNPB Body: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/?[/url]
Enhanced Character Edit: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?[/url]

[/url]
